reviews.content: Their seafood is to die for. I recommend get everything steamed or sashimi. Their seafood is so fresh it should be prepared really simple
The restaurant is quite good. 4 stars. Food and drinks are good. The evening will be more fun and the atmosphere will be more bustling.

name: Chim Đồng Restaurant
intro: Serves dine-in, Has drive-through, Has no-contact delivery
policy: Khách hàng vui lòng liên hệ 84 989 900 001 để biết thêm chi tiết về chính sách của Chim Đồng Restaurant.

reviews.content: Wonderful dining experience! This place serves mountain-style dishes such as wild vegetables, grilled birds, and farm fish cooked with lime. The food is delicious, well-seasoned, and served …

Nhân viên phục vụ và quản lí cư xử vô học. Lần đầu cũng như lần cuối It’s the very first time I ever tried this restaurant. I was filled of food since lunch time but I still wanted give it a try. I ordered a heniken and fried …
Service from the staff was incredible. as was the food.  So very happy we stopped in. Thank you.

The restaurant is spacious, airy, clean, the owner serves very enthusiastically. The food comes out quickly, the cooking is rich in flavor, especially there are quite unique dishes and specializes in delicious country food for everyone. The price is reasonable, 9 people can eat until full for 1,373k.
Delicious restaurant, great service, authentic copper products at reasonable prices, full plate of food. Everyone should visit, you will love it like me.
The restaurant specializes in country dishes, worth the experience.

The restaurant tries very hard to sell food :)). It takes 3 frogs and 8 birds to make the porridge, and 5 eels must be cooked. If you order less, they will complain and not sell it while the food is bad.
Delicious food, delicious bird dish, attentive service
The restaurant is expensive and the food is bad. The menu says soup is 110k but when paying, it's 150k :)) The meal cost 670k. This restaurant doesn't do business properly.

reviews.content: Tourists don't go here. This is a vietnamese place through and through. Seasoning is one of a kind.
Cool place for relaxing and enjoying food. Nice and wide view of river side.
Indoor and outdoor space, fresh atmosphere, delicious food, variety dishes, nice staff, reasonable prices. Kid play yard available,
